markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Drifter's Juke](/Feats.aspx?ID=3171) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 113</row>

**Prerequisites**
[way of the drifter](/Ways.aspx?ID=1)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a firearm or crossbow in one hand, and your other hand is either wielding a melee weapon or is empty.

</column>

---

You move in and out of range to complement your attacks. You Step, make a Strike, Step, and make another Strike. One Strike must be a ranged Strike using your firearm or crossbow, and the other must be a melee Strike using your melee weapon or [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack. You can choose not to take one or both Steps.
